description: Theta series of quadratic form with Gram matrix [ 2, 0, 1; 0, 4, 2; 1, 2, 4 ].
comments: Alternatively, this is the quadratic form with Gram matrix [ 2, 1, 1; 1, 4, 2; 1, 2, 4 ].This is the digonal I lattice (the even holotype) of dimension 3.
links: John Cannon, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
G. Nebe and N. J. A. Sloane, Home page for this lattice
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
